info.title: KPRI Profile API
info.description: API Documentation for KPRI Profile Application

get.description: Returns paginated list of articles with comment counts

post.description: Creates a new article with images

get.description: Returns all comments for a specific article

put.description: Updates the status of a specific comment

get.description: Returns a specific article by ID with its images

post.description: Updates an existing article with images

delete.description: Deletes a specific article and all its associated images and comments

get.description: Returns a list of all available article statuses
Returns a list of all download items sorted by order

post.description: Creates a new download item with file upload

get.description: Returns a specific download item by ID

post.description: Updates an existing download item by ID

delete.description: Deletes a download item and its associated file

put.description: Updates the display order of multiple download items

get.description: Returns a list of all FAQs with user and status information

deskripsi.example: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link...

post.description: Creates a new FAQ item

deskripsi.example: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link...
To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link...

get.description: Returns a list of all available statuses for FAQs
Returns a specific FAQ by ID with user and status information

deskripsi.example: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link...

put.description: Updates an existing FAQ by ID

judul.example: Updated: How to reset my password?
Updated: How to reset my password?

delete.description: Deletes a specific FAQ by ID

get.description: Display a listing of the gallery items.

post.description: Store a newly created gallery item in storage.

get.description: Display the specified gallery item.

post.description: Update the specified gallery item in storage.

delete.description: Remove the specified gallery item from storage.

get.summary: Get all status options for gallery
get.description: Get statuses for dropdown.
Display a listing of hero banners.

post.description: Store a newly created hero banner in storage.

get.description: Display the specified hero banner.

post.description: Update the specified hero banner in storage.

delete.description: Remove the specified hero banner from storage.

get.description: Returns a list of all product categories with product counts

post.description: Creates a new product category

get.description: Returns a specific product category by ID with product count

put.description: Updates an existing product category by ID

delete.description: Deletes a product category if it doesn't have any products

422.description: Cannot delete category that has products

message.example: Cannot delete category that has products

get.description: Returns a list of all services, optionally filtered by service type

post.description: Creates a new service with optional image upload

gambar.description: Service image (JPEG, PNG, JPG, GIF max 2MB)

get.description: Returns a specific service by ID

post.description: Updates an existing service with optional image upload

gambar.description: Service image (JPEG, PNG, JPG, GIF max 2MB)

delete.description: Deletes a specific service by ID

get.description: Returns a list of all service types
Returns a specific service type by ID with its services
Retrieves or creates a Linktree profile for the authenticated user

post.description: Updates the Linktree profile for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieves all links for the authenticated user's Linktree

post.description: Creates a new link in the authenticated user's Linktree

put.description: Updates an existing link in the authenticated user's Linktree

message.example: Link not found or access denied

delete.description: Deletes a link from the authenticated user's Linktree

message.example: Link not found or access denied

post.description: Updates the positions of links in the authenticated user's Linktree

positions.description: Array of link IDs in the desired order

get.description: Returns a paginated list of push notifications with filtering and sorting

message.example: We have launched a new feature...

post.description: Creates a new push notification, can be sent immediately or scheduled

message.example: We have launched a new feature...

get.description: Returns a specific notification by ID

post.description: Updates an existing notification or reschedules it if already sent

message.example: We have improved our new feature...

400.description: Cannot update a sent notification without reschedule option

post.description: Sends a notification immediately, regardless of its scheduled time

get.description: Returns notification counts and recent/upcoming notifications

post.description: Processes all scheduled notifications that are due to be sent

get.description: Retrieve a list of products with optional filtering and sorting

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Field to sort by (nama_produk, harga_produk, stok_produk)

post.description: Store a newly created product in the database

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific product

post.description: Update product information

delete.description: Remove a product from the database

get.description: Retrieve a list of all product categories
Get all promotions associated with a product

post.description: Add a product to one or more promotions

get.description: Returns a paginated, filtered and sorted list of promotions

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter promotions starting after this date

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter promotions ending before this date

post.description: Creates a new promotion and optionally associates products with it

products.description: Product IDs to associate with promotion

get.description: Returns a specific promotion by ID with its associated products

put.description: Updates an existing promotion and optionally syncs its products

products.description: Product IDs to associate with promotion (replaces existing)

delete.description: Deletes a promotion and detaches all associated products

get.description: Returns a list of all products that can be associated with promotions
Returns a list of products associated with a specific promotion

post.description: Adds products to an existing promotion

products.description: Product IDs to add to promotion

delete.description: Removes products from an existing promotion

products.description: Product IDs to remove from promotion

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information

post.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

items.example: The nama user field is required.
The username has already been taken.

post.description: Update the authenticated user's password

422.description: Validation Error or Invalid Current Password

items.example: The current password field is required.
The new password must be at least 8 characters.

get.description: Returns a list of all available statuses
Retrieves all organization members grouped by position for a specific period

parameters.name: id_periode
parameters.description: Period ID to filter by (optional, defaults to active period)

post.description: Creates a new member in the organization structure

items.example: The id jabatan field is required.

get.description: Retrieves all available positions in the organization structure
Retrieves all leadership periods ordered by start date descending

post.description: Creates a new leadership period and optionally sets it as active

items.example: The nama periode field is required.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific organization member

put.description: Updates an existing member in the organization structure

items.example: The id jabatan field is required.

delete.description: Deletes an organization member from the structure

items.example: The nama periode field is required.

delete.description: Deletes a leadership period if it has no associated structure members

message.example: Periode tidak dapat dihapus karena masih memiliki data struktur kepengurusan

get.description: Returns list of published articles

excerpt.example: This is a short excerpt of the article...

get.description: Returns a specific article with all details including comments

content.example: This is a comment on the article

post.summary: Add a comment to an article
post.description: Adds a new comment to a specific article

isi_komentar.example: This is my comment on the article

message.example: Komentar telah dikirim dan sedang menunggu persetujuan.

post.description: Login with username and password to get JWT token

get.description: Returns information about the currently authenticated user

post.description: Invalidates the JWT token
Refreshes the JWT token using the current token

get.description: Retrieves summary statistics including total, today's, and monthly visitor counts

message.example: Failed to retrieve dashboard statistics: Database connection error

get.description: Retrieves a list of recent visitors with their details

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recent visitors to retrieve (default: 10)

message.example: Failed to retrieve recent visitors: Database connection error

get.description: Retrieves monthly visitor statistics for a specific year

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year to retrieve data for (defaults to current year if not provided)

message.example: Monthly visitor chart data retrieved successfully
Failed to retrieve monthly chart data: Database connection error

get.description: Retrieves statistics for the most frequently visited pages

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top pages to retrieve (default: 5)

message.example: Failed to retrieve top pages: Database connection error

get.description: Retrieves daily visitor statistics for the past N days

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of past days to retrieve data for (default: 7)

message.example: Failed to retrieve daily visitor trend: Database connection error

get.description: Returns list of all active download items
Returns a specific download item by ID
Returns list of all frequently asked questions

judul.example: How do I reset my password?

deskripsi.example: You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.

get.description: Returns a specific FAQ by its ID

judul.example: How do I reset my password?

deskripsi.example: You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.

get.description: Returns list of all published gallery photos
Returns detailed information about a specific gallery photo
Returns a list of all hero banners for the front page

deskripsi_hero.example: Find our best products and services

get.description: Returns a specific hero banner by ID

deskripsi_hero.example: Find our best products and services

get.description: Returns list of all service types

get.summary: Get specific service type with its services
get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific service type and all its services

deskripsi.example: Layanan pinjaman dengan bunga rendah untuk anggota koperasi

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific service

deskripsi.example: Layanan pinjaman dengan bunga rendah untuk anggota koperasi

get.description: Retrieves statistics for Linktree visits including total, today's, monthly, and daily stats

message.example: Failed to retrieve linktree statistics: Database connection error

get.description: Retrieves the most common referrers for Linktree visits

user_agent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 14_7_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/14.1.2 Mobile/15E148 Safari/604.1

message.example: Failed to retrieve linktree referrers: Database connection error

get.description: Returns list of products with optional filtering, sorting and searching

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for product name or description

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Field to order by (nama_produk, harga_produk, id_produk)

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific product
Returns all product categories with product counts
Returns list of all active promotions with their discounted products
Returns detailed information about a specific promotion and its products
Returns linktree data with links for public display. If no ID is provided, returns the first linktree.
Returns a list of recent sent notifications

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of notifications to return

message.example: We have launched a new feature...

get.description: Retrieves the VAPID public key needed for push notification subscription

post.description: Stores a new push notification subscription or updates an existing one

delete.description: Deletes an existing push notification subscription

get.description: Returns the organization structure grouped by position for a specific period or active period

parameters.name: id_periode
parameters.description: Period ID (optional, defaults to active period)

get.description: Returns details of a specific organization member
Returns all organization periods

bearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token in the format (Bearer <token>)
